channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AR

item.title: Report X-2024010493
item.description:
Report X-2024010493

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-22T15:12:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-10
  • City: LITTLE ROCK
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO DAMAGED PACKAGE ON THE FLOOR ON PD-3 SECTION DURING THE TWILIGHT SORT. PACKAGE AND CONTENTS WERE A HAZMAT FLAMABLE LIQUID DAMAGE. PACKAGE WAS DAMP BUT NO LIQUID LEAKING FROM PACKAGE. RESPONDER FOLLOWED DECISION TREE AND FLAMMABLE LIQUID RESPONSE SHEET CLEAN UP PROCEDURES AND PLACED PACKAGE AND CONTENTS IN DMP TRAY. PACKAGE WAS TAKEN TO DMN PROCESSING AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2024010247
item.description:
Report X-2024010247

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-17T15:11:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-21
  • City: LOWELL
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2024010247 SequenceEvent: Package was found on the unload rollers by unload door. Package was on it's side. Orientation arrows were not followed. Package was inspected at rollers and a wet spot was found. Package was then taken to QA for further inspection. DescribePack: Liquid seeped out of the cap on to the face of the box that it was set on. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was immediately taken to QA and separated from other packages. 2. X-2024010278 SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS PLACED UPSIDE DOWN AT SOME POINT DURING TRANSIT. PACKAGE WAS TURNED UPRIGHT AND PLACED IN HAZMAT BAG AND DRUM. DescribePack: LEAKAGE FROM THE LID SEALS CAUSED BY PRESSURE FROM LIQUID DUE TO BOX BEING UPSIDE DOWN. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE PLACED UPRIGHT IN HAZMAT BAG AND DRUM.
